text: Marián Labuda (28 October 1944 - 5 January 2018) was a Slovak actor. He was born in Hontianske Nemce, Slovakia. In 1964, he graduated from the Academy of Performing Arts in Bratislava (VŠMU). He became a member of the Slovak National Theatre (SND) in Bratislava. In 1967, he moved to the theatre Divadlo na Korze in the same city. Labuda was known for his movies Dobří holubi se vracejí (1988), The Life and Extraordinary Adventures of Private Ivan Chonkin (1994) and The Garden (1995). He performed more than a hundred of characters on stage. He also regularly appeared in both Slovak and Czech movies. Labuda died on 5 January 2018 in Bratislava, Slovakia at the age of 73. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Slovak actors Category:Movie actors Category:Stage actors Category:Television actors
title: Marián Labuda
